resources.string: SOS Shivankar

Hello shivankar! This is I, Your friendly benefactor [ERROR 420! Name Encoded]${$199#4^7#4_6#4774(#4^;33} ==. :: 
 
 Welcome to S.O.S, 
 You can see 10 icons in your screen each with one of your friend in it, each of them is locked and you will have to complete challenges and solve puzzles to unlock them. Your task is to open all the icons before 2 Hours… or else… There will be consequences , There is a ransomware injected in the phones of everyone you see in your screen , After 2 hours , whoever's icon is still not unlocked , their phone and all their data will be locked forever , The safety of your friend's phones and data is in your hand… This is not a joke , there is real ransomware involved and the only way to avoid it is to unlock the icons.
 Here is a tip for you, READ EVERYTHING 
 Best of Luck : ) 
 
 $initiating sql injection… 
 $encoding data :: 
 bundled{key:\Lvl9_pW10=="FrontMan's N4m3"+"_"+"Y0uRnum63r"\ ; Init Num : "9101440757"\}
 $loading data…
 $Welcome to the game : )
 $ # tap the red SOS to unlock level 1 … … …

You must have many questions… And you might be lost on what to do… Let me tell you about what this app is about and what is your objective…
 Are you wondering who I am? You might know who I am and you might know wrong… I am not your friend, I am your 6^07#3^,
 My name by which you know me is [ERROR 420! Name Encrypted]
 Why this app you ask? HA HA HA ! You know why, don't you? Your Friends love you soo much, and so I thought why not take a test of how much you love them back… HA HA HA HA HA
 All your friends phones are infected by the same ransomware which is infecting your phone now!
 What is a Ransomware you ask? It is a malware that will lock your phone forever and all your phone's data will be lost… Unless… You can finish the game and save your and all your friend's phones.
 
 The Rules of the game are simple : 
 1) You have to complete tasks to unlock levels…
 2) Each level is assigned to one of your friends, those whose level you unlock, the ransomware from their phone will be removed and their phone will be safe…
 3) Those friends whose level you can't unlock in time… HA HA HA HA HA… Their phone is gone for ever…
 4) By unlocking this level, you just removed the ransomware from your own phone for now, but if you fail to unlock all your friends levels, your friends have the option to lock your phone as a retaliation…
 5) Each level contains a message for you, from the friend whose level it is… You have to unlock all level to read each of their messages…
 6) There is a secret gift for you hiding somewhere in the app, but to get to it, you will have to clear all the levels first…
 7) You may get 3 hints from your friends, but each hint will cost you something : )
WARNING! YOU CAN MINIMISE AND CLOSE THE APP, BUT YOU CAN NOT UNINSTALL THE APP, UNINSTALLING THE APP WILL MAKE YOU RESTART THE CHALLENGE AND YOUR FRIENDS PHONES WILL BE LOCKED TILL YOU REINSTALL!\n

Congratulations on clearing your first challenge, did you find it easy?
 Don't Worry, the challenges will get harder as you go… 
 As said in the level-1 each level belongs to one of your friends…
 This is Shainara's Level, Here is a message for you from shainara…

Are you done reading the message?
 Don't be too happy yet, it is just the 2nd level
 Get Ready for your next challenge…
Congratulations, you have reached level 3, did you solve the 2nd puzzle with ease?\n Don\'t think it will be this easy all the time… \n This is Inam\'s Level, Here is a message from Inam…

Congratulations, you have unlocked level 4, did the last game brought back some old memories?
 I know you used to be good at handcricket in your school days : ) 
 But don't let your guard down yet, the challenges will get harder as you go… 
 This is Mukta's Level, Here is a message from Mukta…

$ Task:://level-4/load_challenge 
 $ Loading challenge 4… 
$ For your 4th challenge you will have to Solve a riddle... 
$ Lets see how smart you are...
$ The answer is single word with only small letters(lower case) , no spaces, special characters or capital letters. 
$ BEST OF LUCK :) HAHAHAHAHAHA...
 [i]The Riddle is : [::i] 
 [b]If you drop me I'm sure to crack, but give me a smile and I'll always smile back. What am I?[::b]

Congratulations Shivankar, You have unlocked half of the levels… 
You are not doing bad so far, Are you enjoying the challenges : ) 
Last round, I challenged your intelegence, the next two rounds will be challenging your emory… 
Lets see how good of a memory you possess… 
 But before that, this is Wasim's level and hence, here is a message from Wasim…

$ Task:://level-5/load_challenge 
 $ Loading challenge 5… 
$ For your 5th challenge you will have to Answer a Question based on the image you are provided below 
$ Lets see good memory you have of your school days...
$ The answer is single word with only small letters(lower case) , no spaces, special characters or capital letters. 
$ BEST OF LUCK :) ...
 [b]What was the Subject Taught by the teacher in the following image?[::b]
[i]Image refered in the question is the following one below ::[::i]

Well done, You have completed half of the challenges… 
Expect things to get harder from here : ) This time for real… 
 As I told you last round, there will be two rounds to test your memory, so, this level will be your 2nd memory challenge… so get ready…
 Before we jump into the challenge, This is Joysri's Level, so here is a message from Joysri…

$ Task:://level-6/load_challenge 
 $ Loading challenge 6… 
$ The 6th challenge will not only test your memory, It will also test how much do you know about your dearest friends : )
$ Lets see good memory and friendship you have...
 [i]YOUR CHALLENGE IS :: [::i]
 [b]Write the name of all the members of PFN in the order of their birthday(1st Jan-31st Dec)[::b] 
 $ Don't take age or year of birth into consideration, the question asks who's birthday comes first,second...last in any given year 
$ Write all the names in lower case(small letters) only (no special characters allowed except coma) and use coma ',' to spearate the names 
$ For Example : name1,name2,name3... 
$ Names Spellings should match the following : anamika,debo,inam,joysri,krishna,mukta,shainara,shivankar,siddhartha,wasim 
$ Don't screw it up after so much explaination : ) GOOD LUCK...

Excelent Work so far, you remember all your friends birthdays, that's a great sign that how pure your friendship is… 
Did you find the last challenge hard? :) 
Well that was nothing in comparison to what's coming in the remaining challenges, So get ready… 
I have tested you many times already, lates take a break from the testing and play some games shall we :) 
 but first, this is Debo's level, so , here is a message from debo…

$ Task:://level-7/load_challenge 
 $ Loading challenge 7… 
$ For this round you will be playing guess the number… 
$ I will generate a random number and you will have to guess that random number within 5 turns… 
$ Each time you make a guess, I will tell you if your guessed number is greater than or less than the required number, based on that information you can make your next guess 
$ For eg: you chose 50 , And I say 50 is less than the required number , you can now make your next guess from numbers above 50 
$ All the numbers will be between [1-100](1 and 100 included) 
$ BEST OF LUCK :)…

Great Going Shivankar, You have reached Level-8… 
Was the last game hard? Or did you get very luckey :) 
 If you think last one was hard, this one will be even worse…
 Do you remember playing hand wrestling in school :) How about you play it with me…
 But first, this is Anamika's , so here is a message from Anamika…

$ Task:://level-8/load_challenge 
 $ Loading challenge 8… 
$ This round you will be playing hand wrestling with me… 
$ Do you remember the rules? In case you forgot here are the rules… 
$ You will start with attack, you can select 1, 2 or 3, Your target is to get 3 moves without getting the same number as your opponent, if you get the three moves you move up to pinup , if your opponent gets a number same as you, he will attack and you will defend…
$ If you are defending , your aim is to get a number same as your opponent is in their attack, pinup or finishing move so that you get to attack again…
$ if you complete the attack round you go up to pinup, it is similar to attack but only 1 turn and you have to pick between 1 and 2, your opponent is still defending and can claim attack if you both choose the same number, if you both choose different numbers, you move up to finishing move (same rule for opponent's pinup)… 
$ In finishing move it is exactly same as pinup , but you choose between 4 and 6, getting same as your opponent will send you back to defence and your opponent will attack, if you choose different number from your opponent you win(same rule for opponent's finishing move)… 
$ This process of moving between attack stages(attack,pinup,finishing move) and defence will go on until one side wins… 
$ Defeat me in this game to unlock the next level… 
$ BEST OF LUCK :) You will need it. HA HA HA HA HA HA…

Wow, Look at you, you are at level-9 already :)… 
Did you enjoy the hand wrestling game, did it bring back some old memories? and did you find it easy or difficult? well, if you found it difficult, then I don't know if you will even be able to beat this one… 
So far, You have played some games, and I have tested your memory and intellect, this round I will check how attentive you are :)… 
But Before we start with that, this is Krishna's level, so here is a message from krishna…

$ Task:://level-9/load_challenge 
 $ Loading challenge 9… 
$ To unlock next level , you will have to find the PassWord to the next level and enter it in the entry below… 
$ The password is hidden somewhere in the home screen , you will have to find it DECODE IT and enter it below to open the next level… 
$ Hope you haven't finished all your hints because this is going to be a tough one ;)… 
$ were you paying attention all this time? lets see how smart and attentive you are ;)… 
$ The password should only contain small letter (lower case) alphabets, numbers and the symbol ' _ ' 
$ BEST OF LUCK :) you really need it this time :)…

Finally , you are here, I have been waiting for you :)… You might have already guessed it, you might have known it from the moment you opened the app :)
YES , I AM FRONTMAN , The Red Hooded (not so much) anonymous Friendly benefactor :)… 
Congratulations , You just saved all your friends phones from a ransomware :) A FAKE RANSOMWARE , None of our friends or your's phone was put to risk , It was all just a prank , a play one might say :) I might be a developer, and a script kid hacker too (Very Noob one at that), But I am not a villain, HA HA HA HA HA HA… This was all just a glorified way of saying A HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU!
 This is not just an app, this is our love in 0s and 1s :) (and some free games you can play whenever you are bored)… 
We all hope you liked our small 20MB Birthday Present, The data size might be Less than 20MB, but the love we put in to make this app is immeasurable :heart emoji: 
 Also, This is my level , so here is a message for you, from your friend, your bro, Your MotaBhai :)… But first…
